Articles.Content:
The parts count of my active vessel is fluctuating between the true number and twice that value (14 and 28 for example) this is approximately doubling the mass of the vessel and causing delta-v and manoeuvre node burn times to change as well.

Fig 1: Debug menu showing double part count and mass. Mechjeb Delta-V showing true Delta-V.

Fig 2: Debug menu showing correct part count and mass. Mechjeb continues to show true, now matching, Delta-V.

The part count and mass switches every half-second or so.

Modlist from CKAN:

Any chance you could get log files posted to show this?  And perhaps the craft file?  Asking because if something freaky is happening, the log or craft files might hold the key.

6 hours ago, Scarecrow71 said:

Any chance you could get log files posted to show this?  And perhaps the craft file?  Asking because if something freaky is happening, the log or craft files might hold the key.

Google Drive folder has the log file in a .zip folder, and the .craft file.

Parts and mass and fuel are exactly doubled, which suggests that every part is doubled, rather than some parts staying as x1 while other parts are mysteriously x3. However, thrust stays constant at 25kn so the engine is sort of not doubled. Weird.

Does this bug affect multiple vessels or only one? If one, launch a new copy of that craft to see if it still happens.

On 10/13/2022 at 2:15 PM, DeadJohn said:

Parts and mass and fuel are exactly doubled, which suggests that every part is doubled, rather than some parts staying as x1 while other parts are mysteriously x3. However, thrust stays constant at 25kn so the engine is sort of not doubled. Weird.

Does this bug affect multiple vessels or only one? If one, launch a new copy of that craft to see if it still happens.

This effects all my vessels if they have any delta v. Interestingly enough the actual craft and true delta v are unaffected, with Mechjeb and KER showing the proper values.

3 hours ago, OmegaAndromedae said:

This effects all my vessels if they have any delta v. Interestingly enough the actual craft and true delta v are unaffected, with Mechjeb and KER showing the proper values.

Depending on how annoying that is, backup your entire KSP folder, then try resetting settings and deleting groups of mods to see what changes. Restore the backup when you're done and make the specific change that fixes the problem.
